C

calculateJulianDate(LocalDate) - Method in class model.Moon
Calculcate date from gregorian callendar to julian calendar
calculatePhaseOfMoon(LocalDate) - Method in class model.Moon
Calculate phase of moon for provide date
checkPhaseRange(double) - Method in class model.Moon
Check if phase is between 0 and 1 if isn't in this range throw PhaseException
controller - package controller
Class in this package is responsible for manage a whole program

G

getDateFromUser(String[], View) - Method in class controller.Main
Check if pDate is date, if pDate is date processes her to LocalDate object, if pDate isn't date program get date from user and return LocalDate object

I

ifUserClickCancelOrExit(String) - Method in class controller.Main
Check if user click cancel or exit in widget

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class controller.Main
Start a entire program by calling a function named process
Main - Class in controller
Main class is responsible to manage a whole software
Main() - Constructor for class controller.Main
 
model - package model
Classes in this package represents models
Moon - Class in model
Represents Moon and provide calculate for phase of moon

P

PhaseException - Exception in model
Exception class for objects thrown when phase is above 1 or below 0

Constructor with message
process(String[]) - Method in class controller.Main
Processes the entire program

S

showErrorInfo() - Method in class view.View
